resources.string:
Shorty
 Generate shortcuta 

 The display shows two fields for the name and url of the radio station. Fill in the fields and touch the Create button to create the shortcut. The Cancel button will close the display. The Lookup button on the toolbar will open the Lookup display. 

 Look up stations 
 The display shows the same to fields which may be filled in by selecting an item on the list or using the keyboard. The Add button will add an entry. The Remove button will remove the selected entry. The Select button will close the display and return. The toolbar buttons may be used to play, stop, pause or restart the selected station directly. 

 Save and Restore 
 The Saveand Restore items on the menu may be used to save and restore the current list of stations. The file location is Shorty/entries.json. This folder is accessible from a file manager or a connected PC. The file is in JSON format (http://json.org). It may be edited with a text editor.
